name: DICE²ROLL
description:
Challenge your brain with these exciting dice puzzles! In DICE²ROLL, control two dice to reach the target number for each level. Can you beat them all?

Controls:

  • Dice 1 - WASD
  • Dice 2 - Arrow Keys
  • Reset Level - R
  • Pause - Escape / P

Credits:

  • Jakub Bas - Programming / Design
  • Ben Thompson - Programming / Audio
  • Owen Speight - Art / Design

Game developed for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. Theme: Roll of the Dice

Sound effects used under CC0 license from Freesound.org.

Made in Unreal Engine 4
